name: Ore no Shikabane wo Koete Yuke
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To play this software on your PLAYSTATION®3 system, you must have at least 420MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system hard disk.
To play this software on your PSP®, you must install the latest system software version and have a Memory Stick Duo™ with the free space stated above.
For more detailed information about downloading to your PSP® system, please see URL below.

http://asia.playstation.com

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.
??

?Game description
Shouji Masuda's generations-spanning RPG "Over My Remain", originally released in 1999, is now available at Downloadable Games!
Make your own history! It's the Heian period, dominated by demons and monsters. There is a family afflicted by two pesky curses. Name your character, and start the game; he will die several hours later. You must protect the name of your family as the generations continue.
You must decide what you will leave your children, what legends you will entrust to them.


?PS3™ HDD and Memory Stick Duo™ capacity requirement
420MB


?Copyright notices
©1999 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. All rights reserved.


?Attention
This software is converted from the software for PlayStation® so that it can be played on PS3™ and PSP®.
Please note that there may be some functions that cannot be used due to the difference of hardware,
and that the software may not operate in the same manner when it is played with PSP®.
One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.
